description: The dual-SIM device Samsung Galaxy Note20 Ultra runs on Android 10 (One UI), and sports a 6.9 inches, 117.7 cm2 (~92.5% screen-to-body ratio), 1440 x 3088 pixels (~494 ppi density), Dynamic AMOLED 2X capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors with a 20:9 aspect ratio. The device is powered by Exynos 990 (7 nm+) – Global or Qualcomm SM8250 Snapdragon 865 (7 nm+) – USA, Octa-core (2×2.73 GHz Mongoose M5 & 2×2.50 GHz Cortex-A76 & 4×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55) – Global or Octa-core (1×2.84 GHz Kryo 585 & 3×2.42 GHz Kryo 585 & 4×1.8 GHz Kryo 585) – USA processor, coupled with 8 GB of RAM and 256/512 GB of inbuilt storage which is expandable up to microSDXC (uses shared SIM slot) card. The Galaxy Note20 Plus 5G features a triple-camera setup at the rear, comprised of a 108-megapixel main sensor with an f/1.8 aperture, a 12-megapixel secondary sensor with an f/3.8 aperture and also comes with the Dual video call feature. The second 12 MP camera enables ultra-wide-angle photography and can be selected through the camera app on the smartphone. Just fire up the 10 MP Front Camera for lit selfies on your social feed with the In-Display Flash, selfie focus mode, and f/2.2 aperture. The amazing Note20+ 5G is available in two different colors White, Black, Red, and other colors. This device is unstoppable with a 4500 mAh battery under the hood and has a Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, and barometer alongside the Fast Fingerprint Unlock feature to unlock your phone quickly.
